publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4146 Dennis Canavan: Congratulations to Team GB Wheelchair Curlers—That the Parliament congratulates Scots, Kenneth Dickson, Frank Duffy (Skip), Thomas Killin, Angela Malone and Michael McCreadie, who make up the Great Britain wheelchair curling team, on their recent silver medal success at the IX Winter Paralympic Games in Turin. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, John Swinburne*, Christine May*, Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*, Bristow Muldoon*, Bruce Crawford*

S2M-4146 Congratulations to Team GB Wheelchair Curlers (lodged on 20 March 2006) Fergus Ewing*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Rob Gibson*, Karen Whitefield*, Pauline McNeill*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*, Chris Ballance*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Kate Maclean*, Mike Pringle*, Margaret Jamieson*, Karen Gillon*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Nora Radcliffe*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4146 Congratulations to Team GB Wheelchair Curlers (lodged on 20 March 2006) Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*, Iain Smith*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4146 Congratulations to Team GB Wheelchair Curlers (lodged on 20 March 2006) Shiona Baird*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-4146 Dennis Canavan: Congratulations to Team GB Wheelchair Curlers—That the Parliament congratulates Scots, Kenneth Dickson, Frank Duffy (Skip), Thomas Killin, Angela Malone and Michael McCreadie, who make up the Great Britain wheelchair curling team, on their recent silver medal success at the IX Winter Paralympic Games in Turin. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, John Swinburne, Christine May, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Bristow Muldoon, Bruce Crawford, Fergus Ewing, Dr Elaine Murray, Rob Gibson, Karen Whitefield, Pauline McNeill, Mrs Nanette Milne, Jackie Baillie, Bill Butler, Chris Ballance, Christine Grahame, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Kate Maclean, Mike Pringle, Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Mr Frank McAveety, Nora Radcliffe, Eleanor Scott, Ms Sandra White, Robin Harper, Trish Godman, Iain Smith, Mr Adam Ingram, Shiona Baird, Marlyn Glen, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4146 Congratulations to Team GB Wheelchair Curlers (lodged on 20 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Brian Monteith*
